    NEWS2 Observation Guidance

    Guidance for populating the NEWS2 Observation.

    The NEWS2 observation the CareConnect-NEWS2-Observation-1 profile.

    Guidance for Populating a NEWS2 Observation

    Note that some elements are “Left uncurated as no use case in NEWS2”, and are not needed for NEWS2.

    CareConnect-NEWS2-Observation-1 element Population Guidance
    identifier A unique identifier assigned to this observation (such as a generated universally unique identifier (uuid))
    basedOn Left uncurated as no use case in NEWS2
    status Fixed to "final"
    category Sending a category is optional. Systems may send their own category code (provided a code and system from which the code was picked are available). If no local category code is available, then category code may be fixed to "survey" and system fixed to "http://hl7.org/fhir/observation-category"
    code code is fixed to "1104051000000101" system is fixed to "http://snomed.info/sct"
    subject A link to the Patient
    context Left uncurated as no use case in NEWS2
    effective[x] The date and time that the NEWS2 score was confirmed, using effectiveDateTime.
    issued Left uncurated as no use case in NEWS2
    performer A link to the performer who carried out the NEWS2 score. This must be a qualified practitioner and associated organisation.
    value[x] The actual NEWS2 score as a valueQuantity. The NEWS2 score is carried in valueQuantity.value. Optionally a unit may be sent. If sending a unit, the system is fixed to "http://unitsofmeasure.org" and the code fixed to "{score}"
    interpretation Left uncurated as no use case in NEWS2
    comment Any additional notes or actions that the performer wishes to convey
    method Left uncurated as no use case in NEWS2
    device Left uncurated as no use case in NEWS2
    referenceRange Left uncurated as no use case in NEWS2
    related If NEWS2 sub-scores are being sent in the message, related will point to the contained CareConnect-SubScore-Observation-1 resources (population guidance is here). For further information about referencing a contained resource see here.

    If no NEWS2 sub-score are being sent, but supporting observations are being sent, then the related element will point to the supporting observations. Supporting observations are not contained withing the CareConnect-NEWS2-Observation-1 resource. The related links will reference the observations within the NEWS2 bundle. The related observations are
    CareConnect-BloodPressure-Observation-1 (population guidance here)
    CareConnect-BodyTemperature-Observation-1 (population guidance here)
    CareConnect-ACVPU-Observation-1 (population guidance here)
    CareConnect-HeartRate-Observation-1 (population guidance here)
    CareConnect-InspiredOxygen-Observation-1 (population guidance here)
    CareConnect-OxygenSaturation-Observation-1 (population guidance here)
    CareConnect-RespiratoryRate-Observation-1 (population guidance here)

    If no sub-scores and no observations are being sent along with the NEWS2 score, then the related element is omitted.
